member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.CommandRouting
member.summary: Provides an alternate way of routing Visual Studio commands.

member.summary: Gets the value of the on a .

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.CommandRouting.InterceptsCommandRouting
member.summary: If true, prevents Visual Studio commands from being routed to the active command target, and instead causes raw WPF input to be routed to the element itself. Otherwise, commands executed in the Shell will follow their regular routing process.

member.summary: Sets the value of the on a .
member.param: The element on which the property is to be set.
The value of the property to be set.
